metadata.title: CVE-2018-20349 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The igraph_i_strdiff function in igraph_trie.c in igraph through 0.7.1 hasan NULL pointer dereference that allows attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted object.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20349` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libigraph0v5 - 0.7.1-2.1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: igraph package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.7.1-2.1+deb9u1build0.16.04.1').
